text: læa xyangri lea thi chan ca klaw sing thi phwk than hı mi phakhi khun doythi phwk than mi klaw thi phwk than di hı mi pha khi kæ xallxhˌ sung sing thi phraxngkh midi thrng hı mi hlakthan dı «lng ma kæ phwk cea nı sing nan læw fay dı lea nı sxng fay nan pen fay thi smkhwr tx khwam plxdphay ying kwa hak phwk than ru
